James Leo Colby (September 21, 1961 – February 23, 2018) was an American actor. Colby appeared in many Broadway plays and few stage productions in Connecticut.
Colby was known for his roles "The Pacemaker" (1997), "Tower Heist" (2011), "Safe" (2012), "The Amazing Spider-Man 2" (2014) and in "Patriots Day" (2016). In television, he was known for his role as Sergeant Ray Dwyer in "Chicago P.D." and Burleson in "Empire".
Colby died on February 23, 2018 at the age of 56.
